title: Inception
description: A thief who steals secrets through dream-sharing technology

title: Titanic
description: A love story aboard the ill-fated Titanic

title: Avatar
description: Humans on a mission to exploit resources on a distant planet

title: The Dark Knight
description: In this critically acclaimed superhero film, Batman faces off against the Joker, a criminal mastermind unleashing chaos on Gotham City. As the Dark Knight struggles to defeat this agent of anarchy, he must confront impossible choices that test his commitment to justice.

title: The Flash
description: Barry Allen uses his super speed to travel back in time and change the past

title: Spider-Man: Beyond the Spider-Verse
description: Miles Morales embarks on an adventure across the multiverse

title: The Marvels
description: Captain Marvel teams up with Ms. Marvel and Monica Rambeau to face a cosmic threat

title: Dune: Part Two
description: Paul Atreides unites with the Fremen to seek revenge against the conspirators
